title: Replace Contact page with India Support Contact details (email + Instagram only)

requirements.text: Replace the existing Contact page content (including the contact form) with a single section titled "India Support Contact" that displays only the provided email address and Instagram handle, and does not display any phone number.

quotes: need india contact details do not add our number just add our email and instagram id awarenessoveraddictionoffial@gmail.com
1. india contact details only india support contact 2. awarenessoveraddictionofficial 3. replace

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /contact shows a page with the heading "India Support Contact".
The page displays the email address exactly as: awarenessoveraddictionoffial@gmail.com.
The page displays the Instagram handle exactly as: awarenessoveraddictionofficial.
The email is a clickable mailto: link and the Instagram handle links to https://instagram.com/awarenessoveraddictionofficial (opens in a new tab).
No phone number is shown anywhere on the Contact page.
The previous contact form fields (Name, Email, Subject, Message) and submit button are removed from the Contact page.
User-facing text on the Contact page remains in English.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
Do not add any phone number to the Contact page.
nonGoals: Do not implement backend contact-form submission or data storage.
Do not change site navigation routes or add new pages.
